name: Furry Shades of Gay 3: Still Gayer
name_original: Furry Shades of Gay 3: Still Gayer
description:
Furry Shades of Gay 3: Still Gayer continues the epic saga of furry men loving other furry men with new stories, new characters and other new things!



The sex will get even hotter with new, much longer and more varied animations. All the thrusts and tugs and jerks and stretches are more expressive now and our animators are having an absolute blast with them. And for the first time in the series all the animations will have voice acting and sound effects!



The puzzle engine is getting another upgrade as well. New goals, new obstacles, and new themed levels await you! Plow through all the targets and you’ll get to see your favourite characters plow each other!



Don’t forget to add the game to your wishlist and click the follow button so you won’t miss out on exciting news and exclusive previews!


Percy and Blake are looking for a love nest to call their own. While on search, they stumble upon an old Victorian mansion and decide to take a closer look. To their surprise, the door has locked behind them, so they have to delve deep into the mystery… Ghosts don’t exist after all, do they?


There are still a few days left from the work trip, and Alex is bored in his room alone. Italy always reminds him of Valentino and the spark that ran between them in college. Well, the phone call is made and Alex is on his way to his own hot Italian adventure.


Hugo is a work procrastination legend. He spends his time chatting with a very hot stranger who just adores his round ass, on his phone. But what happens if his boss William catches him? He's not going to fire Hugo, is he?


Summer is coming to an end, and the shift at the scout camp is ending, too. Connor feels a little sad for the days gone by, and does he… feel something for Dan? But Dan is also a guy... It seems he doesn't seem to care as much as Connor, who is trying to sort himself out.


Millennial Maiki has millennial problems - his back hurts. His masseuse, Adele, unfortunately has a day off, but promises to come up with something to help with his urgent request. And it seems that her “something” is already knocking on Maiki's door to save his tense muscles.

Features

  • Five all new, even gayer stories
  • More than 60 fully original artworks
  • Longer animated sex scenes with sound and voiceovers
  • Branching narrative, hard choices, sloppy rewards
  • Updated Match-3 gameplay with new goals and features
